actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 42, United States Code.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Defines, for purposes of the Old-Age and survivors Insurance Benefit program of the Social Security Act, the duration of the period of nonattendance at an educational institution permitted to a child under such program in order to remain eligible as a full-time student for child insurance benefit purposes. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 402(d)(7)(B))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 42, United States Code.
